title: Squid Vel'Koz
body:
Vel koz is a really fun champion to play as, but in my opinion he dosnt really have any interesting skins except for the "Battlecast VelKoz" so here is a skin idea i would like suggest.

Name of Skin: Octokoz (or what ever dosnt matter)

Design: He can look like a squid or octopus, hes colour would be light pink, hes eyes can be inside hes beak.

Abilities: (i forgot the names of abilities so bear with me)

Q: hes Q abilitie can shoot a ball of ink at hes opponent that explodeds into two blob fish covered in ink.

W: he can summon a small reef in a line that has fish floating on top and around it and the fish will dissapear after the reef explodeds

E: he summons a geiser that explodeds shooting bubbles up into the air

R: hes ultimate can makes him shoit a constant beam of ink at hes opponent covering them with ink during when they are affected by the slow effect.

I think this would be a very nice skin for velkoz because he is a very cool champ and if you agree vite yes and id you dont you can vote no but i woyld like to know if anyone else agrees with this idea ty.

replies.body:
I posted this exact idea 1 year and 3 months ago

EDIT: Main idea was actually a jellyfish, but the squid idea was still in there and one of the votes.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/oPm4kOAN-new-volkoz-skin-idea
Oh that's cool i didnt know but thats coolXD
Lol who would. most posts are ignored unless its about QQ
